abstract.text: Renders the layer and its sublayers into the specified context.

inlineContent.text: The graphics context to use to render the layer.
This method renders directly from the layer tree, ignoring any animations added to the render tree. Renders in the coordinate space of the layer.

The OS X v10.5 implementation of this method does not support the entire Core Animation composition model.
layers are not rendered. Additionally, layers that use 3D transforms are not rendered, nor are layers that specify
values. Future versions of macOS may add support for rendering these layers and properties.

abstract.text: Returns an image from the contents of the current bitmap-based graphics context.
An object that manages image data in your app.
A Quartz 2D drawing environment.
Render, compose, and animate visual elements.
An object that manages image-based content and allows you to perform animations on that content.
An array of Core Image filters to apply to the content immediately behind the layer. Animatable.
A CoreImage filter used to composite the layer and the content behind it. Animatable.
Returns a Boolean indicating whether the layer content is implicitly flipped when rendered.
A hint for the desired storage format of the layer contents.
A Boolean indicating whether drawing commands are deferred and processed asynchronously in a background thread.
A bitmask defining how the edges of the receiver are rasterized.
An array of Core Image filters to apply to the contents of the layer and its sublayers. Animatable.
A Boolean that indicates whether the geometry of the layer and its sublayers is flipped vertically.
A Boolean value indicating whether the layer contains completely opaque content.
An optional layer whose alpha channel is used to mask the layer’s content.
The scale at which to rasterize content, relative to the coordinate space of the layer. Animatable
Renders the layer and its sublayers into the specified context.
A Boolean that indicates whether the layer is rendered as a bitmap before compositing. Animatable
A layer that draws a cubic Bezier spline in its coordinate space.
The path defining the shape to be rendered. Animatable.
A Quartz 2D drawing environment.
